name: Clicker Upper - a better ClickUp
description:
Some style improvements for ClickUp. 

Primarily, the default list view scatters different sections (grouped by status) of a list, making it hard to visualize. This stylesheet fixes that (both on default and dark mode).

Box view also get a nice colored bar for better visualization of different groups.
additional_info:
version 0.0.1 - initial upload. list styles and minor box view styling.
version 0.0.2 - updated list header to light gray
version 0.0.3 - removed the 'tab' for skeleton content in list view (thanks Jeff)
